name: Micromon Adventures
description:
Micromon Adeventure is a new adventure game with an IDLE feature that is based on the Micro Monsters. It enables the players to develop their monsters anytime and anywhere

[Auto Mode & Offline Rewards]
Players can get a bunch of rewards even when offline! Rich contents and functions let you explore micromons' world easily!

[Epic Pixelmon & Super Evolution]
Hundreds of classic cool microlmons available! Various ways to boost the power of your micro monsters! Set up your best micromon team!

[Fights & Gym Training]
Strive to become the strongest! Master PVP and PVE modes and advance quickly on the path to become the strongest monster trainer!

[Special System & Z-Move]
In addition to the game‘s rich contents of monster characters, skills, species and formations, the Z-move system can also boost the power of your Legendary micromons! Time to bring back your childhood memories!
